title: Viet Nam-Finland International School Signs Partnership with Moreton Bay Colleges, Australia | VFIS - Vietnam Finland International School
text:
Viet Nam-Finland International School Signs Partnership with Moreton Bay Colleges, Australia
On September 15, 2025, the Vietnam-Finland International School (VFIS) officially signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Moreton Bay Colleges, Australia. This event is a significant step in strengthening VFIS’s international partnerships, with the goal of providing teachers and students with opportunities for comprehensive learning, exchange, and development.
Under the terms of the agreement, the two schools will implement a range of practical activities, including: Teacher exchange programs to share educational philosophies, achievements, and teaching methodologies; Sharing teaching experiences and subject assessment methods; Cooperation on curriculum development, training programs, online projects, extracurricular activities, and other initiatives; Collaboration on language training and cultural exchange to be enhanced between students of both schools.
Following the signing, VFIS and Moreton Bay Colleges plan to organize various exchange activities and propose the establishment of a language club to boost students' communication skills. This will create opportunities for students to experience a multicultural educational environment, helping them foster integration skills and a global citizenship mindset.
----------------------------
